dmca.title: [AB-C132877W] Copyright Infringement by Bruce Dailey - Webmaster of Jciti.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal. Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Posted At: Wednesday, July 12, 2006 5:15 AM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [AB-C132877W] Copyright Infringement by Bruce Dailey - Webmaster of Jciti.com Subject: [AB-C132877W] Copyright Infringement by Bruce Dailey - Webmaster of Jciti.com Reference: [AB-C132877W] For your review. Thank you, Policy Enforcement The Planet Internet Services, Inc. http://www.theplanet.com/legal/ ==== Original Message ==== 1. Copyright Infringement by Bruce Dailey - Webmaster of Jciti.com Added by system at Wednesday, Jul 12 2006 04:35 am X-MailFrom: robpongi@yahoo.ca X-RcptTo: abuse@abacus.inside.theplanet.com Received: from [172.16.214.181] by [10.5.0.64] (abacus) for ; Wed Jul 12 04:35:04 2006 Return-path: Delivery-date: Wed, 12 Jul 2006 04:35:03 -0500 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com ([70.87.6.111]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from robpongi@yahoo.ca) with esmtp (Exim) id 1G0b7X-000Cwt-Dg for abuse@abacus.inside.theplanet.com; Wed, 12 Jul 2006 04:35:03 -0500 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 12 Jul 2006 04:35:02 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from robpongi@yahoo.ca) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1G0b7W-00023S-Ra for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 12 Jul 2006 04:35:02 -0500 Received: from web33603.mail.mud.yahoo.com ([68.142.199.192]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from robpongi@yahoo.ca) with smtp (Exim) id 1G0b7W-000Cwi-Kc for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 12 Jul 2006 04:35:02 -0500 Received: (qmail 95429 invoked by uid 60001); 12 Jul 2006 09:35:02 -0000 DomainKey-Signature: a=rsa-sha1; q=dns; c=nofws; s=s1024; d=yahoo.ca; h=Message-ID:Received:Date:From:Reply-To:Subject:To:MIME-Version:Content -Type:Content-Transfer-Encoding; b=Ipgy+H9akYaa28B7PMFUvJOTkrybmCvY0A3QPqU3lhyKLnF0BlPL14y3VRZAnkyLRzA5O9 7ykXzISQI6AxN0UbUqVw8a3+LrQxfn7l3w8hMD2229iTX/kK+BlHnU1tuF62LHdsRzFlJnQZ oNw2jfgA0GrVJh88VrbsT8qkeD58M= ; Message-ID: <20060712093502.95427.qmail@web33603.mail.mud.yahoo.com> Received: from [203.216.104.73] by web33603.mail.mud.yahoo.com via HTTP; Wed, 12 Jul 2006 05:35:02 EDT Date: Wed, 12 Jul 2006 05:35:02 -0400 (EDT) From: Rob Pongi Reply-To: robpongi@yahoo.ca Subject: Copyright Infringement by Bruce Dailey - Webmaster of Jciti.com To: abuse@theplanet.com MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="0-1607262878-1152696902=:91758" Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit Received-SPF: none (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: 68.142.199.192 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of yahoo.ca) client-ip=68.142.199.192; envelope-from=robpongi@yahoo.ca; helo=web33603.mail.mud.yahoo.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 12 Jul 2006 09:35:03.0077 (UTC) FILETIME=[73A8FD50:01C6A596] Received-SPF: none (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: 70.87.6.111 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of yahoo.ca) client-ip=70.87.6.111; envelope-from=robpongi@yahoo.ca; helo=smtp02.theplanet.com; (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) To The Planet, I have just recently discovered that one of your customers, Mr. Bruce Dailey, who is operating the jciti.com domain, is hijacking and/or cacheing my RobPongi.com website here: http://www.jciti.com/jLinks/out_frame.php?PHPSESSID=017e7176ab4c65c0288b 8ed12bcfa329&ID=614 Mr. Bruce Dailey runs a directory here: http://www.jciti.com/jLinks/ and for all the 370+ links, including mine, in that directory, Mr. Bruce Dailey has setup deliberate and deceptive hijacks and/or cacheing of pages for every site listed within that malicious directory. The link for my "Asia Entertainment Online" website can be found here: http://www.jciti.com/jLinks/index.php?PHPSESSID=017e7176ab4c65c0288b8ed1 2bcfa329&PID=9 and when one clicks on the above link, it does not connect with my website at http://www.RobPongi.com, but instead it connects with a hijacked and/or cached version of my website inside the jciti.com domain here: http://www.jciti.com/jLinks/out_frame.php?PHPSESSID=017e7176ab4c65c0288b 8ed12bcfa329&ID=614 And, obviously, this is a deliberate copyright infringement which is, in fact, against your Acceptable Use Policy as specified here: http://www.theplanet.com/legal/index.html Intellectual Property Infringement Policy "Customers may not transmit, distribute, download, copy, cache, host, or otherwise store on a Server any information, data, material, or work that infringes the intellectual property rights of others. The Planet has the right to disable access to, or remove, infringing content to the extent required under any law or regulation, including the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998." "The Planet reserves the right to suspend permanently or terminate the Services of any Customer that repeatedly violates The Planet's Intellectual Property Infringement Policy or any copyright law." Previously, I wrote the below email to Mr. Bruce Dailey requesting removal of the link to my "Asia Entertainment Online" website from his jciti.com directory, but did not receive any response whatsoever. Therefore, I am now officially requesting that you, The Planet, who is the internet service provider of this malicious jciti.com directory, to shutdown that domain immediately and if possible, begin an immediate criminal investigation against Mr. Bruce Dailey in relation to this matter. I highly suspect that he has committed several acts of copyright infringement and very possibly even more serious fraudulent crimes. I truly hope that you, The Planet, will be able to fully cooperate with my requests and see to it that any and all proper authorities are notified about this incident as needed and that swift and just actions are taken in order to prevent these malicious and deceptive criminal acts from continuing on your network. I have not yet spoken with my legal advisors about this matter, and I certainly hope that I do not have to. Thank you and regards, Rob Pongi President Asia Entertainment Online http://www.RobPongi.com P.S. Below is my previous email sent to Mr. Bruce Dailey requesting removal of the link to my website from his jciti.com directory: Date: Sat, 8 Jul 2006 22:09:11 -0400 (EDT) From: "Rob Pongi" Add to Address BookAdd to Address Book Subject: Mr. Bruce Dailey To: bmdailey@yahoo.com To Mr. Bruce Dailey of Jciti.com, Please remove my "Asia Entertainment Online" site listed in your directory here: http://www.jciti.com/jLinks/index.php?PHPSESSID=017e7176ab4c65c0288b8ed1 2bcfa329&PID=9 I have already removed the reciprocal link to your site from my www.RobPongi.com site. Thank you, Rob Pongi http://www.RobPongi.com --------------------------------- All new Yahoo! Mail - --------------------------------- Get a sneak peak at messages with a handy reading pane. MIME element (text/html) To The Planet,

I have just recently discovered that one of your customers, Mr. Bruce Dailey, who is  operating the  jciti.com domain, is hijacking and/or cacheing my RobPongi.com website here:


http://www.jciti.com/jLinks/out_frame.php?PHPSESSID=017 e7176ab4c65c0288b8ed12bcfa329&ID=614

Mr. Bruce Dailey runs a directory here:

http://www.jciti.com/jLinks/

and for all the 370+ links, including mine, in that directory, Mr. Bruce Dailey has setup deliberate and deceptive hijacks and/or cacheing of pages for every site listed within that malicious directory. The link for my "Asia Entertainment Online" website can be found here:

http://www.jciti.com/jLinks/index.php?PHPSESSID=017e7176ab4 c65c0288b8ed12bcfa329&PID=9

and when one clicks on the above link, it does not connect with my website at http://www.RobPongi.com, but instead it connects with a hijacked and/or cached version of my website inside the jciti.com domain here:

http://www.jciti.com/jLinks/out_frame.php?PHPSESSID=017e717 6ab4c65c0288b8ed12bcfa329&ID=614


And, obviously, this is a deliberate copyright infringement which is, in fact, against your Acceptable Use Policy as specified here:

http://www.theplanet.com/legal/index.html

Intellectu al Property Infringement Policy

"Customers may not transmit, distribute, download, copy, cache, host, or otherwise store on a Server any information, data, material, or work that infringes the intellectual property rights of others. The Planet has the right to disable access to, or remove, infringing content to the extent required under any law or regulation, including the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998."

"The Planet reserves the right to suspend permanently or terminate the Services of any Customer that repeatedly violates The Planet's Intellectual Property Infringement Policy or any copyright law."


Previously, I wrote the below email to Mr. Bruce Dailey requesting removal of the link to my "Asia Entertainment Online" website from his jciti.com directory, but did not receive any response whatsoever. Therefore, I am now officially requesting that you, The Planet, who is the internet service provider of this malicious jciti.com directory, to shutdown that domain immediately and if possible, begin an immediate criminal investigation against Mr. Bruce Dailey in relation to this matter. I highly suspect that he has committed several acts of copyright infringement and very possibly even more serious fraudulent crimes.

I truly hope that you, The Planet, will be able to fully cooperate with my requests and see to it that any and all proper authorities are notified about this incident as needed and that swift and just actions are taken in order to prevent these malicious and deceptive criminal acts from continuing on your network. I have not yet spoken with my legal advisors about this matter, and I certainly hope that I do not have to.

Thank you and regards,

Rob Pongi
President
Asia Entertainment Online
http://www.RobPongi.com


P.S. Below is my previous email sent to Mr. Bruce Dailey requesting removal of the link to my website from his jciti.com directory:


Date:     Sat, 8 Jul 2006 22:09:11 -0400 (EDT)
From:    "Rob Pongi" <robpongi@yahoo.ca>  Add to Address BookAdd to Address Book
Subject:    Mr. Bruce Dailey
To:     bmdailey@yahoo.com

To Mr. Bruce Dailey of Jciti.com,

Please remove my "Asia Entertainment Online" site listed in your directory here:

http://www.jciti.com/jLinks/index.php?PHPSESSID=017e7176ab4 c65c0288b8ed12bcfa329&PID=9

I have already removed the reciprocal link to your site from my www.RobPongi.com site.

Thank you,

Rob Pongi
http://www.RobPongi.com
